pages.text: $(1)I find it curious that, so far, we have not focused our attention on the mechanics of the Nether Portal. Why should some igneous stone and a flame create a connection to that bizarre Underworld?
$(1)Whatever the cause is, it is clearly a rather energetic phenomenon. $(br2)Therefore, it might be possible to passively harvest Power from a Portal, as one would from a $(item)Blaze Rod$(0).
